messages.title: The realistic alternative to the Tories in New Forest West
messages.content: Janice has lived in Dorset & Hampshire for 24 years and is married with a daughter. She was a lecturer at Bournemouth University for 22 years before retiring and was the Labour candidate in the last general election. Janice says: 'The LibDems and Greens cannot win the national vote. If you want to stop the Tories, then Labour is the only realistic alternative.'

messages.title: Labour action in our area
messages.content: Labour is investing in creating a health NHS to better fit the needs of people locally, which the local MP, very proud of.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in creating a health NHS to better fit the needs of people locally.
Child poverty measures and support for children's education through initiatives like Sure Start Children's Centres.
Providing free local bus travel for over 60's to reduce traffic congestion.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The LibDems and Greens cannot win the national vote. If you want to stop the Tories, then Labour is the only realistic alternative.

issues.education: Support for children's education through initiatives like Sure Start Children's Centres.
issues.health: Investment in the NHS to better fit the needs of people locally.
issues.socialWelfare: Child poverty measures and support for education.

leaflet.personalStatement: "We believe that EVERYONE should have the power to shape their destiny. The Tories believe that there is a fixed quota of talent in our society," Janice Hurne.

endorsements.endorsement: Janice will make an excellent hardworking constituency MP for New Forest West.
